全球意识；完整的意识，知觉

sentences.sentence: The 1980s brought an awareness of green issues.
He was tortured by an awareness of the equivocal nature of his position.
sentences.translation: 他意识到很难解释自己的立场，因此备受折磨。

sentences.sentence: The project should raise general awareness about bullying.
sentences.translation: 这个项目应该引起对恃强凌弱现象的普遍注意。
